text: Line 12 (Sapphire) (, formerly Line F (Purple), is one of the seven lines operated by CPTM and one of the thirteen lines that make up the Sao Paulo Metro Rail Transport Network, in Brazil.Line 12 (CPTM) Website (Portuguese) ==Stations== ==References== ==External links== * Official page of the CPTM * Secretaria dos Transportes Metropolitanos Category:Companhia Paulista de Trens Metropolitanos CPTM 12
title: Line 12 (CPTM)
